1.text: Traces is coming back to us again!

3.text: It was last here a few years ago

4.text: From the Canadian contemporary circus company 7 Fingers

7.text: And they're in this tradition of bringing circus acts into the stage

10.text: And making it more of a theatrical presentation

12.text: So in fact you're entering the world of the artists

16.text: Traces is a classic piece of contemporary circus

19.text: It's got a narrative, the artists talk to you

22.text: You feel very much part of their world

23.text: And of course, it's got all the usual fantastic skills

26.text: that you would expect from a company like 7 Fingers

32.text: All told in an entertaining - and quite a sort of urban

36.text: It's nothing like a big top - in fact it's the opposite!
